predicate.note: Frames file for 'extract' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

example.name: transitive
example.text: Bond investors paid close attention to comments by Federal Reserve Chairman Alan Greenspan , who [*T*-1] was testifying before a congressional hearing , but were n't able [*-2] to extract many clues about the future course of the Fed 's monetary policy .
example.arg: many clues about the future course of the Fed 's monetary policy

example.name: all arguments
example.text: But above all , this is the national headquarters for boiler-room operators , those slick-talking snake-oil salesmen who [*T*-1] use the telephone [*-2] to extract money from the gullible and the greedy and then vanish .
